metadata.title: CVE-2024-35904 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:selinux: avoid dereference of garbage after mount failure In casekern_mount() fails and returns an error pointer return in the error branchinstead of continuing and dereferencing the error pointer. While on it dropthe never read static variable selinuxfs_mount.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
